@netorarasaur if anything, senpai just dodged a bullet. I mean she loves seeing Shuu suffer in the end after all and a divorce will probably her greatest high. After that, everything will diffuse because she’s owned by senpai, she can no longer feel the same high. The sex is good but the emotional pleasure is gone and damn it won’t be long till a new cycle happened. They saved society by keeping the cycle in their own loop.

It’s really hard to find other NTR as weirdly compelling as this one. It’s either simply broken or simply stolen. This one is… complicated to say the least. Also the bonus chapter is nice though, basically saying “ This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental”

I'm just gonna ramble from this point on. No, she did not fuck with all the omiai she met. She does tease Shou, pretending that she did but then she steps on his dick and calls him a pervert. The only normal characters in this series that I feel sorry for is Haruka's father and that senpai guy. This series also made me laugh with how Shou's father was pretty much the only one who put up much of a fight to refuse the whole thing. I love Shou-chan's traumatised expressions along with the hot sex scenes. I love how Haruka actually became more aggressive and deviant despite the whole thing starting because of her inability to say no. I love how Shou-chan got more normal and more fucked up at the same time with him realising his love for Haruka yet still desiring a higher level of NTR bringing even his own father into it. So yeah this is a 10/10 and I like @joejava's analysis even if i find that it's slightly wrong. 2/2

it isn't really all Haruka's fault because before she mentions being on the pill, she states "I only wanted to have sex with you. I wanted to have your baby but then..." which clearly shows that she didn't intend to cause Shou's weird fetish/anxiety. She then reveals how she was on the pill whenever she had sex with Shou which is where the misconception comes in. However, she says right after " I wanted to be sure I wouldn't get pregnant. By you, that is." where we can assume by the last sentence that she started going on the pill once Shou's demands were too much for her. Furthermore, the reason why Haruka went on the pill wasn't only because of how she hates Shou, she also went on the pill as she knew her mental state was definitely not ready for a child. Also, her love for Shou was genuine, as was his love for her. Saying Haruka is some sadist bitch who wanted Shou to suffer just leaves a bad taste in my mouth. Haruka is more complex than that. 1/2

@joejava what I understood from that is that this is all harukas fault then as she was secretly taking pills which put pressure eon the mc and the she got upset when she was forced to suffer for the consequences of her own actions instead of just straight up telling him that she either didn’t want to be together or that she didn’t want a baby

Shuu’s perversion:
He gets sexually excited at the emotional-turmoil of having his wife have sex with other men. She agrees to let him choose her sexual relationships. The better looking the man, the closer the relationship of the man to him, and the more vocal the man is at using his wife the more jealousy and shame he feels which leads to greater sexual excitement. He will often be in physical contact with his wife as she has sex with another man, she will position his head so that he is forced to watch her being violated and she will make eye contact with him as she pleasures her partner.

Shuu’s perversion manifested from his family, friends, and wife putting pressure on him to have a child. He develops Erectile Dysfunction (ED) due to performance anxiety of not being able to impregnate his wife. For sexual satisfaction he masturbates to imaginary images of his wife having sex with other men. This eventually leads to his over coming his ED problem by having sex with his wife immediately after watching her have sex with other men.

Haruka's perversion:
She get sexual pleasure at seeing Shuu in pain, especially his emotional suffering from her infidelities. She enjoys watching his face as the emotional-turmoil becomes so great he starts tearing up. She will insult, ridicule, and embarrass him by comparing his body and his sexual performance unfavorably when compared to her lovers.

Haruka’s perversion manifests from her desire to a good wife and mother, but feeling unworthy to be a mother since she does NOT want to have Shuu’s biological children (page 17 Ch 26). She is ultimately responsible for Shuu’s perversion manifesting, since it was impossible for him to get her pregnant with her secretly taking birth control pills.
She hates Shuu for not putting a stop to the infidelities, allowing both of them to develop their perversions.
She loathes and is disgusted with herself for feeling sexual excitement at seeing Shuu suffering.

Their relationship defined:
Only after they have been separated for three years does she tell Shuu about the birth control pills. Shuu holds her tight and tells her that he wants her to be a mother and that he will always remain her husband and together they will raise her children (he accepts being a netorare cuckold). They both agree that they love each other and are happiest when they allow their sexual perversions to rule them. Haruka tells Shuu SHE will now in choose her sexual relationships and will continue to bully him (cause him emotional-turmoil with her infidelities).

So what does the ending mean:
Haruka is now sleeping with whomever she wants, trying to get pregnant. The last pages show a large pair off male shoes in the entry way, meaning Haruka is having sex in their apartment.
Shuu gets excited and loudly announces "I'M HOME".

I see a lot of people saying that they had a "happy ending" sort of but c'mon the girl definitely went half insane, she was pretty normal at the beginning but then she snapped to be able to accept the reality of what she was living. 

She was not a fucking dumbass like the mc from the start she just became insane to be able to deal with what was going on, why ? Cuz she's a fucking dumbass but in an even worse way, she was a very good person, the worst type of thing you can be in this world, this shows that even a complete fuck can ruin a good person to become that pathetic mess, just cuz she was trying to make him happy. 

Overall great fap but still makes me infinitely pity her every read.

Also i love how everyone jack off to gangbang, harem, orgies, unconsensual sex, loveless sex, and other depravity and promiscuity but when a husband and wife, who love each other but wants other people to fuck the wife from time to time, is off limit and too far. Don't usually talk this much but after reading 600 pages of a magnum opus smut drama story i just need to let my thought out there

Though i really feel sorry for the senpai and haruka's dad. That senpai was used and tricked by haruka into doing her. I hope that senpai could get over haruka and haruka's dad could accept the fact that her daughter's husband let people sleep with his wife, well at least enough to reconcile with haruka, he has every right to hate shuu-chan tbh. Man the story is better than most fucking pornhwas or actually, actual legit ecchi drama mangas published by mainstream magazines.

The whole story is them coming to terms to shuu-chan's fucked up cuckold fetish. Instead of "hey my negative trait/flaw is gone now" resolution, i like how both came to accept shuu-chan's flaw instead. I mean yeah sure he likes when other people fuck his wife but if you put that aside, they're both good people. Shuu-chan is faithful to haruka (because he's the one who want haruka to fuck other people) and he help out people in need while haruka loves her husband and just want shuu-chan to be happy.
Usually character like tatakura is shitty cuck ball but in this case he's the only sane person that really wanted to help her

The story itself is just a string of dumb shit done by the MC and his retarded thought process. However, I've seen realities which are way dumber than this story, therefore this manga is actually very realistic.

Netoraserare explained for idiots: MC loves his wife. MC is a masochist that gets turned on only by NTR. MC is not actually a cuck because it pains him to see his wife with other men. MC in his infinite stupidity decides that instead of taking Viagra for turn-on problems, he decides to force himself and his wife through Hell and Back because he's that much of a retard. This whole ordeal almost destroys the couple, but because they're such a perfect fit for each other, the couple survives.

Lesson learned? Don't be an idiot and think about the consequences of your actions before taking important life decisions.
